amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress that flexible spending arrangements should be established for members of the uniformed services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1788 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1788 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S8005-8017; text: CR S8014) To express the sense of Congress that flexible spending arrangements should be established for members of the uniformed services.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1788 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Boxer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1788 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
